Name: Aztec
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao
1 drop Hot pepper sauce (red vinegar-based e.g. Tabasco)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS flamed orange zest twist over cocktail, then use as garnish.
Review: Whiskey with the merest touch of herbal and chocolate liqueurs spiced with a wisp of pepper.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2007 by Neyah White, Nopa, San Francisco, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Aztec contains 200 calories
